com.github.shynixn.petblocks.api.business.service

Interface PersistencePetMetaService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PersistencePetMetaServiceImpl

    public PersistencePetMetaService

    Created by Shynixn 2018.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PersistencePetMetaService

        public PersistencePetMetaService()

    • Method Detail

      • getAll

        java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<java.util.List> getAll()

        Returns future with a list of all stored interface PetMeta. As not all PetMeta data is available during runtime this call completes in the future.

        See Also:
        interface PetMeta

      • clearResources

        <P> java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<java.lang.Void> clearResources(P player)

        Clears the cache of the player and saves the allocated resources.

      • getPetMetaFromPlayer

        <P> PetMeta getPetMetaFromPlayer(P player)

        Gets the interface PetMeta from the player. This will never return null.

        See Also:
        interface PetMeta

      • refreshPetMetaFromRepository

        <P> java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<com.github.shynixn.petblocks.api.persistence.entity.PetMeta> refreshPetMetaFromRepository(P player)

        Gets or creates interface PetMeta from the player.

        See Also:
        interface PetMeta

      • save

        java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<com.github.shynixn.petblocks.api.persistence.entity.PetMeta> save(PetMeta petMeta)

        Saves the given petMeta instance and returns a future.

        See Also:
        petMeta

      • hasPetMeta

        <P> boolean hasPetMeta(P player)

        Gets if the given player has got a cached pet meta. Only makes sense to be checked in special cases. Do only check it before calling getPetMetaFromPlayer(#player) if you get cache miss errors.

      • getCache

        java.util.List<com.github.shynixn.petblocks.api.persistence.entity.PetMeta> getCache()

        Gets all currently loaded pet metas.

      • close

        void close()

        Closes all resources immediately.
